name: electron-vosk-speech
description: Lightweight Speech Recognition Library for Electron. Based on [nodejs-speech-kiosk-usercase](https://www.npmjs.com/package/nodejs-speech-kiosk-usercase) and [vosk-api](https://github.com/alphacep/vosk-api).
author: Dmitriy Aleksandrovich Chernukho <wfuzerbar@gmail.com> (https://github.com/gormonn)
